title: Why is Pulsefire Ezreal disabled? o.o
body: Yeah why is it disabled? :o I wanted to play Ez, but now I don't because the skin is disabled. {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: If you played on PBE in the recent cycle, there was a hilarious bug with the skin. It was actually pretty bad as well. Basically, his walking animation became faster and Ezreal's portrait became a white square.
So that was an expensive skin I can't even use now? Will it be refunded to me?
He's disabled due to a visual bug. Sorry about that!

*starts to build a tear then sells it*

Can't cry, it's Ez.
Probably had some particle issues that Riot is fixing.
